DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the non invasive measurement of arterial pressure (Nexfin monitor)with the invasive measurement of arterial pressure (radial artery catheter) - during induction of general anesthesia, - during a leg raising test in the Intensive Care Unit
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Nexfin During Anesthesia and in Intensive Care (NexfinEval)
DOC.criteria: Age >18 ASA II, III or IV weight between 40 and 180 kg; BMI < 35 normal Allen's test and/or hand Doppler examination. cardiac arrhythmias, history of vascular surgery or vascular implant in the upper limb Raynaud disease
